text: Casino Royale is a 1967 spy-comedy movie. The movie is about James Bond being forced from retirement to investigate the deaths and disappearances of international spies. Ursula Andress plays Vesper Lynd. David Niven plays James Bond. The movie was a financial success. It took in over $41 million worldwide. The reviews for Casino Royale, were mixed. ==Other websites== * * Category:1967 comedy movies Category:1960s spy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:1960s English-language movies Category:James Bond movies Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Scotland Category:Movies directed by Robert Parrish Category:Movies directed by John Huston Category:Movies directed by Val Guest Category:Movies directed by Ken Hughes
title: Casino Royale (1967 movie)
